stepAnswer: when the column contains information you'd like to conceal during a presentation
stepTitle: When can it be helpful to hide a column on a spreadsheet?
choices: when the column contains information you'd like to conceal during a presentation
when you need to prevent collaborators from editing the contents of the column
when the column contains a formula that needs to be hidden to display the result.
when you need to prevent collaborators from viewing the contents of the column
